mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) a ) where rnum=( select rnum from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) a ) where bno=#{bno} )+1

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) a ) where rnum=( select rnum from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) a ) where bno=#{bno} )-1
mapper.update: update board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent}, bdate=sysdate, bfile=#{bfile} where bno=#{bno}
update board set bstep=bstep+1 where bgroup=#{bgroup} and bstep>#{bstep}
